title: Credo
description: An unrequited love.A tortured past.An unbreakable bond.Their love was well-known throughout the immortal world.The powerful Taldeburu Waleron and his Delara.But tragedy struck and tore them apart for years. One believing the other was dead.When fate finally brings them back together again it isn’t kind. It’s cruel and testing. Sacrificial.Because love has no remorse for its victims.It doesn’t give you options.And it won’t be stopped.This is Waleron and Delara’s story. It’s not pretty and it’s not kind.But it's theirs.A band of fierce warriors walk in the shadows of the human world with capabilities derived from the senses: Trackers, Sounders, Healers, Tasters, Visionaries and the rare Reflectors. They are known as the ‘Scars'.
author: Nashoda Rose
